content: "Spend Analysis" feature is really spotty. Occasionally manual adjustments works, but more often than not it doesn't work at all. The app /still/ doesn't show cents, despite seemingly using them behind-the-scene, leading to a very small difference between the balance shown on the app vs. what you would have if you calculated your transaction manually, as you can only see up to ones and not cents. Every other banking app I used shows cents values, because they value transparency and accuracy.
replyContent: Hello Jagoan! Sorry for the inconvinience you experienced. You can provide detailed information about the problem you are facing by contacting Tanya Jago at 1500746 /+62 21 3000 0746 or e-mail to tanya@jago.com. Our agents will be happy to help you.

content: I just activated my Jago account and the registration initial process almost became a red flag for me as it always get stuck on its final process until i forced to restart it. When i tried to login, it got stuck (again) on the 2 steps verification as i never received the notif on my phone. Not sure why but it has been a bad experience and i started to worry. User experience is one of the critical point for building image and trust. I believe the company could find ways to resolve this issue.
replyContent: Hello Jagoan! We apologize for the inconvenience. This will be a record for us in the future to continue to develop banking services. If there is anything else you want to ask, please contact Tanya Jago at 1500746 / 021-30000746 or e-mail to Tanya@jago.com. Our agents are happy to assist you.

content: For app made from scratch, specifically for DIGITAL banking, the developer team is surely poor. 5 mins OTP expiry for email verification, and the OTP took half a day to arrive in the inbox. Link to bibit and gopay using SMS instead of whatsapp OTP. I was told that there are foreign currency savings like BTPN's jenius, but there isn't here. Main page is clustered with pocket this pocket that, I don't need. Customized page is a norm these days. App notification for incoming transfer is good though
replyContent: Hello, Jagoan! Sorry for the inconvenience you have experienced. We take every feedback and concern seriously to continuously improve ourselves. If there is anything we can help you with, please don't hesitate to contact us at Tanya Jago at 1500746 or email tanya@jago.com. Our agents are happy to help you.

content: Even simple tasks like logging into the app gives trouble and error repetitively. Customer service can only provide answers and solutions according to the template, even though they know that the solution does not solve the root cause. As a result, the same problem keeps recurring. If the banking app can't handle login issues properly, how can they protect their customers' financial security? I'm withdrawing my money from this bank and considering deleting the app forever.
replyContent: Hello, Jagoan. We apologize for the inconvenience you're experiencing. No need to worry, you can explain the details of the issue via email at tanya@jago.com or call our customer service at 1500 746 for further assistance. Thank you :)

content: I have been using jago apps for more than 1 year now but recently I have issues with them. content: It will be a great if you give option dark mode, because my eyes sensitive during the night.

Work most of the time (v8.34.1) Sugggestions: 1. Allow ability to delete notifications related to "Nabung Rutin" from Bibit 2. Can't remove spotlight banner 3. Payment with VISA is unreliable, sometimes the payment is rejected by vendor (ie Google, Humblebundle, GitHub) and what I usually do is either link the VISA to my PayPal account or delete then create new VISA card (the new one almost definitely work) 4. Ability to get reminded on upcoming subscription would be nice addition
excellent support but sometimes history transactions are not updated (need uninstall & re-install)

It is a great app in general, but i have a suggestion. When we generate the bank transfer proof/receipt, it would be nice if you censor several numbers of our bank account as the sender for privacy concerns. We usually share the receipts with other people, so i don't want my bank account credentials to be seen by others.

This is really good digital banking services and platform. Easy to use, easy to navigate. All my banking needs that I usually do from conventional bank is covered by this app. In addition, connection with various financial apps and wallets is a plus. Yet, I give short of 1 star from the perfect is because I experienced hiccups during first setup. I did refer to some of my friends, but all of them have difficulties during initial setup. I haven't refer the app to anyone since then.

content: Setiap saya melakukan pindah kantong atau transaksi, data ga langsung terupdate alias harus direfresh dulu. Itu harus diperbaiki sih. Sisanya bagus.
Mau dapet tambahan saldo 25 rb pake kode referral RENDEEEC...

Saya seneng banget sama itu fitur Auto-Budgeting baru. Tapi sayang banget Kantong Utama gak bisa jadi Kantong Tujuan untuk Auto-Budgeting. Saya terima uang ke kantong khusus terima uang dan Kantong Utama untuk pembelian sehari hari karena pembayaran default untuk Transfer atau Pembayaran QRIS adalah Kantong Utama. Jadi bakal sangat membantu kalau saya bisa buat Auto-Budgeting harian dari kantong terima uang ke Kantong Utama untuk budgeting belanja harian. Terima Kasih, semoga masukan diterima :D

Aplikasinya bagus sekali saya bisa atur pocket sesuai yg saya ingingkan. Namun saran saya untuk auto payment bills sangat bagus jika bisa memilih dari pocket mana yg saya kehendaki untuk dibayarkan. Untuk skrng hanya bisa dri main pocket saja
Untuk saat ini sih oke. Mudah²an untuk seterusnya tetap oke ya.

content: easy to use and very convenient

I have used this seabank apps for 2 years. So far, it's been a good experience in doing daily banking. I can deposit, withdraw, top up, shopping (shopee-linked) easily. However when shopping using sebank-QRIS, most of the transaction fails. It only works when I scan the shopee QRIS. However many merchants such as minimarkets and shopping malls don't have shopee QRIS, so I have to use other bank apps.

simple and user-friendly interface, I like it but in my opinion you need to add more futures such as bill payment like credit cards, and for utilities etc as far as I know at this moment you only have electricity (PLN), the rest is fine.

content: The only reason I'm using this is for online debit transaction. Otherwise, I wouldn't use this awful app. The performance is frustratingly slow, the method to switch our accpunt to another phone is extremely annoying and time consuming, and most importantly, out of nowhere they take Rp10.000 out of your account. What's worse is that it accumulates. I'm thinking of finding an alternative for my needs.

The apps performance is really bad, super slow. It keeps on loading for more than 30 minutes. I often face difficulties to open the apps. Once it is opened, it only displays loading screen so that I can't use any feature. The flexi saver and dashboard is often show wrong balance such as 0. The bank charges Rp10k every month just for a service like this. The process for closing account is also uncomfortable. Please fix either the apps or the procedure to close account. Thank you.

Do NOT ever open the account or even install this app. I tried to transfer my balance from this not-so-genius app to OVO, and all I got is there is the problem with my internet connection, while I can do other transactions. What kind of service is this?? This doesn't happen only once or twice, it happens almost EVERY TIME. It is so annoying, I usually a straight person, if your service is good, 5 stars there you are. But this time? Nah, I would give zero star if I can.

I used to love this app so much, but since the last update the UI seems so heavy and slower. It's really bothering when you have to send money but stucked in the main page. Worse, this happened after the feesible thing taken every month. No, I did'nt paid monthly fee for a slower and ineffective app like this. We don't really need new UI, we want simple and dependable banking experience.

I give up on registering an account via this app. I did it twice but still failed. The call center sounds helpful but solving nothing at the end. I think the problem is not the stability of the Internet connection, but your app is too heavy. This makes the account verification difficult. I rarely leave a review on this Google play. This might be because I do want to use Jenius, but the experience itself is too bad.

It is highly not recommended to use this application, especially to open an account here, after the "BIG" update that changed the UI/UX appearance of the application, there were lots of bugs and lags during use. Not only that, the service for checking transactions also takes a very long time, especially during maintenance which requires us to wait a long time and there is no warning or notification beforehand if maintenance will be carried out. Not recommended !!

This is maybe the right time I have to tell the team. I've been experiencing freezing and extremely long time to load the app. Even from the pin/fingerprint log in. It's often to not be able to open the In/out menu to see the payment history/prove. Please fix this problem and I think there's such a big problem with your server or something. The speed is badly slow. Love the features, but you guys have to consider the user experience & usability more.

Wow my review just vanished. No problem I'll write it again! Be careful with this app! Lost my money from this app. It automatically transfer out my money without any command or setting from me. Surprisingly, the transfer history gone too (yes, first it appeared then gone few hours later). So it must be from someone who can access their system! Already called and chatted the customer care, but their chat service are getting worse everytime. Spent many calls and still no solution! Disappointing!
replyContent: Hi Rahmat, sorry for your inconvenience. For this issue you can call Jenius Help from 1500 365, so our team can help to check your issues. Thank you. 😉

content: Amazingly slow performance and always failed to activate my account. When it comes to be connected to video call, the apps was force closed at any time I tried. I followed the operator to try many times. Now, I refuse to try again. My phone works well with another banking apps even to make the same video call or stream HD video. If it is possible to rate 0 star, I'll do.
replyContent: Hi Christin, Sorry for the inconvenience. We appreciate your feedback that can help to improve Jenius in the future so we can provide better services. Please send a detailed description of the problem to jenius-help@btpn.com. We will definitely provide you with a solution soon. Have a nice day 😊

content: In theory, this app/product could be a great payment solution, especially for those who doesn't have access to online payment method. But, the system is hardly reliable, logging in to the apps take time, card verification failed. It's just not dependable. The CS team is super slow when it comes to handle complaints. And there is also some annoying UI that ask whether you're still want to chat while it's the CS that takes an awful long time to reply. Disappointing 1/5
replyContent: Hi Bayu, Sorry for the inconvenience. We appreciate your feedback that can help to improve Jenius in the future so we can provide better services.Please send a detailed description of the problem to jenius-help@btpn.com. We will definitely provide you with a solution soon. Thank you 😊

content: Everytime I change my debit card limit it will automatically change itself to a certain lower amount. My subscription has failed the payment due to this issue even though I have enough money. On top of that, somehow now I cannot change my card limit and it just shows me a white screen of death. Are you doing this so you can charge me extra fee for the failed payment? I am frustrated, this is NOT cool! Fix your app!

funny how the amazing features of this app still can't make me forgive the super slow, sluggish, glitchy, error-prone UX. you have the audacity to charge your credit card users 500k + 120k feesible a year for this terrible app with tons of errors and failed transactions? you're joking. it's been years yet your improvement is literally close to none. we still have many options for digital banking apps with speedy performance and fairer charge, so you better be on the mend.

This app really give me headache. Can't login to the app on the new phone. Whenever I try to enter email and password, after that it automatically push me back to the login page. It says my 'session is expired', EVERYTIME!.. while the other banking app are easy to switch and use on new phone, more comfortable and seamless banking experience than this one. Sigh.

After the update I can't even login into my account, it asks me to scan my finger prints then ask me to input my pin over and over again but still cannot log in. At first I thought it was my internet connection but NO! I can play YouTube on 720p without problem and no buffering. And the WORSE is there's no button to connect me to call center or any help whatsoever! I never leave a bad Review before this but this is just too much! Please fix the God damn server FFS!
replyContent: Hi, please email us a screenshot of the error you are facing along with your mobile number at jenius-help@btpn.com so we can look into this for you. We apologise for any inconvenience.

content: I'm so sorry for giving you 1 star. I have a problem with login with my fingerprint and my PIN. I tried more than 3 times, but it still failed. So, i restarted my phone and login it back. Firstly, it took about 1 minute for Jenius app to process my fingerprint. When the app still got lag, i tried to cancel my "Dream Save It", but 'till now it's still on "Processing to Cancel" loading page and my balance doesn't change. So, please fix it ASAP! I love Jenius so much, it helped me a lot.
replyContent: Hi, Rheza. Mohon maaf atas ketidaknyamanan yang kamu alami. Saat ini Jenius mengidentifikasi beberapa pengguna tidak bisa akses Jenius secara optimal. Kami sedang berupaya memperbaiki kendala ini dan memohon kesabarannya beberapa waktu lagi hingga proses ini selesai sepenuhnya. Terima kasih. 😊

content: Very laggy. Very slow. And the customer service on twitter says that we need to clear data and cache if it lags. But as it lags everytime i need to use it, so i have to clear data first before hand. EVERY SINGLE TIME. It is so unreliable. Considering this app handles all private financial data of mine, i hope the developer will prioritize making the app faster and more reliable as well as secure.

Been using this aplication for months now.. at fisrt this app is great. It's convenient and very easy to use. But nowadays many problems occur; such as it's hard to do transaction ( failed every now and then), the page isn't loaded completely, unable to login due to wrong pin number even though i didn't change the pin number and when i reset to new pin still unable to log in. It's really hard to use now...
replyContent: Hi Putri, Sorry for the inconvenience. We appreciate your feedback that can help to improve Jenius in the future so we can provide better services.  Please send a detailed description of the problem to jenius-help@btpn.com. We will definitely provide you with a solution soon.Thank you 😊

content: I don't know why this is suddenly happening to me. I never have any problem with Jenius Application before, I know that it was always slow in responding when you try to open your app, but this thing happen to me now, never actually happen before. So, I really want you to help me. I couldn't sign in into my own account. Everytime I try to sign in then set my pin, it always said that my session is expired, so I logged out automatically. I already try to uninstall the app but it didn't work either.

I can't even begin to fathom on how bad the service is. First, they won't allow you to log back in to your account after resetting your phone or after getting your phone stolen for "security reasons". Not only that, the process to get your previous device unlisted is a nightmare, especially if you don't remember the specific details for your latest transaction with them. Not only that, they had the gall and audacity to charge 10,000 IDR/month for this kind of service. Y'all flopped!

Please think twice if you want to start saving at Jenius, the apps is taking too long to load even the homepage, let alone do the saving or bank transfer. I never ever successfully downloaded the receipt even though the feature was there. To make it worse, it has been months this issue occured to me. As a long time user of mobile banking of some other bank with very simple yet responsive application, i think i will be thinking to move all my saving if this issue still persist.

Very unstable and really slow loading time. Suddenly can't log in due to unknown reason for almost 6 hours straight. The most unbelievable thing is it's already happen MANY time. It seems they don't even try to fix this issue. It's hella annoying when you really need to transfer/do something about your money, yet you can't access or do anything about it. Seems like your system not "Jenius" enough, I think?

content: Already submit all the data end activated via video call but said account cant be activated without any explanation why! After that I tried to open the app again then app said that my PIN was incorrect. 3 times I reset my PIN still the same. Why dont just tell us why the accout cant be activated. Easier!
replyContent: Halo Dita, mohon maaf atas ketidaknyamanannya. Segera laporkan ke Jenius Help 1500 365 atau kunjungi Jenius Live terdekat untuk dibantu pengecekan. Terima kasih :)

content: Need to send money, but I can't login. The sessions expired and automatically log me out. When I found out, we actually need to unlink our previous devices if any chance we changing our gadgets. Like seriously? And to get to the call centre take a long time to connect to the right services. For the email itself kinda slow response while we're in panick thinking we gonna lose our money or not

It's soooo hard to open the app, at first I thought it was just a connection problem. Now i know the problem was not on my connection, it's the app. I've been using jenius for like months now, and I rarely get those problems before. But since the last January, it became worseeeeee! SRSLY
replyContent: Hi, can you please send us your account details along with the screenshot of the problem to jenius-help@btpn.com so that we can help you. Thank you for using our app.

content: Most features are great and also most features are not so often to being used. Since, the "Feesible"/monthly subscription fee came out, I actually hate it and the app taking so long to load.
It sould be a great app. However it becomes slower and slower. Always deal with loading and reloading. It takes several loading until the transfer is sucessful. Very time consumming.

Tried to log in after a while and it never lets me get in. Every time I try to complete the proses, it sends me back to the main screen with the 'session expired, automatically logged out' notification.

Suppose to be a great apps for millenials. Jenius have many features than other bank, unfortunately Jenius Mobile Apps, and Web Apps are worse than other bank. I can't transfer my money to other, apps always give me error message "something went wrong" or "the saving account is no longer valid". This apps also so slow, slower than snail, sometimes it ask me to reload to fetching the data 😣. Please make your apps better
replyContent: Halo Ricky, mohon maaf atas ketidaknyamanannya. Silahkan dicoba login dan transaksi kembali ya :)

content: I have an updated version of the app and the app suddenly closed many times everytime i tried to do the transaction. It so annoying. I have reported the case via email and customer service call but the response was disatisfying and the problem not being solved yet.

Please improve your mobile phone application. It's veryyyyy slow. Start from enter password, withdraw fund to "saldo aktif" until transfer can take around 6 minutes! When i first use Jenius 2 years ago, it wasn't this slow. I stick to Jenius despite the feasible fee because of the no bank charge transfer. But please please please fix your application.

I can't log into my account. I even tried to change my password, but everytime I'm redirected to login page, saying my session expired. I've tried 10 times. And still nothing. Just when I need to use it the most. Duh

People have been forever begging to fix the slow loading issues but it seems the developer turn blind eye on it or they're just lazy. The slowness is irritating but they have done nothing since the first time i downloaded this app.

I can't even use the app, always asks to wait or reload the dashboard, clicking on Jenius Help button made the app crashed. Not sure if they will seriously fix the app, seeing a lot of people have similar problem, I have my doubt.
replyContent: Hi, can you please send us your account details along with the screenshot of the problem to jenius-help@btpn.com so that we can help you. Thank you for using our app. 😊

content: The app is actually great, but I keep getting deduction 5k for every fail transaction from e-card. I've been getting 50k deductions for 1 month just because I forgot to top up my e-card. I will uninstall this app and find another banking app which less cost me with unrequired admin charge.

Trash application, dont use it, hard to register and literally require you to re register everything when the video call regidter fail. There is no logout option, and require you to reinstall the whole app before you can re register Very inconvenient, 100% not recommended

It was a fine slow mediocre banking app, but then it suddenly didn't recognize my fingerprints, refusing my password and (reset) token! I uninstalled the app, and now I can't even reset my password since there's always "error unknown" after I enter my email. Please fix it!
replyContent: Halo, untuk kendala yang kamu alami bisa konfirmasi ke Jenius Help melalui telepon 1500365 untuk dibantu pengecekan, ya. Terima kasih. 😊

content: Poor transaction cancellation handling, it takes 46 working days from the date of report to jenius not the date of cancellation from merchant to refund a transaction which is a lot more than usual banks. There's also annoying notification that advertise their features like flexicash which cannot be turned off. The app itself is also not responsive, it takes time to load all the account information.
replyContent: Hi, Darrien. Mohon maaf atas ketidaknyamanan yang kamu alami. Waktu yang diberikan tersebut adalah estimasi proses penyelesaian, prosesnya bisa lebih cepat, ya. Mohon kesediaan kamu untuk dapat follow up ke Jenius Help melalui telepon di 1500365 untuk dibantu pengecekan laporan kamu. Terima kasih, ya. 😊

content: This ap is far from being jenius lol. I just downloaded and set up my login info, but then it logged me out and I can't login back with any method (fingerprint, pin, password). So ridiculous! Then with the very poor quality of video verification, I managed to get a hold to one of the CS. After struggling with the call, I received an email that they couldn't verify my identity. WTH? I showed my ID card and answered the personal question! So idiotic
replyContent: Hi, Gisela. Mohon maaf atas ketidaknyamanannya. Terkait kendala yang kamu alami, bisa menghubungi Jenius Help melalui telepon di 1500365 atau e-mail ke jenius-help@btpn.com untuk dibantu pengecekan. Terima kasih. 😊

content: I did an online purchase but they failed to process my payment, but my card was charged without authentification. And i had to wait for 46 working days to get my money refunded from Jenius. What took you so long? I've given you all the data you asked & the marketplace have told me that they haven't charged anything if my payment is not confirmed. It's been my second time experiencing this. You need to add authentification steps BEFORE charging my card or hold the transaction until it is confirmed
replyContent: Hi Siska, we apologize for this. Please be patient to wait for the settlement from the bank, settlement can be faster or maximum 46 business days. Thank you :)

content: Your app becomes highly unreliable. It's either error loging in, unable to do transaction. Fix it please. You are a bank handling people's money in this all digital payment era. I'm really disappointed and highly unsatisfied. Cant even transfer my money. And always the same excuse, maintenance. Well please mind the time on doing your maintenance. Dont do it on weekdays at working hours. Seriously.. Your customer needs you to do what you promised,a reliable app that ease transactions.

Seriously? after you charged for failed payment and now you will charge for monthly subscription. What will you charge in the future? My refund payment from 3rd party didn't even return yet. We know your application is useful, but there are also other apps competing to win the consumers' hearts too. Your consumers might lose interests in you. Don't do the same mistake as Whats*pp.

The feature is good but the performance, customer service, and reliability is bad. Maintenance for 2 days? Guys you are banking service. What banking service doing maintenance for 2 days straight? Whenever I have to change device, it used to be as simple as logout and login from the old device. Now, I have to contact the customer services to unlink the old device and it's not even instantly and need to wait for another 2 days. Why you make this redundant step? It's wasting your customer time!

This app really.. really bad. Transaction get transferred with "progress" status. I tried talk with jenius help and she says the application is under maintenance right now (this happened at 8AM) so i need to check regularly if transaction succeed or not. If your under maintenance, please make my transaction fail, so i can using another bank to transferred my money. If you using this bank to pay something that have limited time (ex: airfare bill), my advice please dont use this app. Hopefully they fix it ASAP.
replyContent: Halo Akmal, terima kasih atas feedback yang kamu berikan untuk Jenius. Kamu masih berkesempatan untuk mendapatkan kuota bebas biaya transaksi yang info lengkapnya bisa kamu cek di  https://www.jenius.com/faq/bebas-biaya-transaksi. Terima kasih. 😀

content: Update 12 Apr 2023: app is getting slow. Very often not working because so laggy. Will not recommend this digital bank to anyone!!! ------- Pin is not always working. Almost everytime I use jenius, the apps need to unlink device to get the pin to work properly. What a cumbersome. And you can't pay Credit Card from jenius account using send it feature. Really bad CX. If I can give minus point, surely I'll give -5
replyContent: Maaf atas ketidaknyamanannya Aji Purwoseputro. Feedback kamu akan kami tampung untuk perbaikan Jenius kedepannya. Terima kasih.

content: tried to move balance from IDR to USD but it fails many times, said balance will be added but it doesn't change. Help chat very very very slow, call and email are not very helpful either. Finally I gave up, transferred all my money out and uninstalled the app.
replyContent: We apologise for the difficulties you experienced while registering with us. If you would like some assistance or additional information, please contact us via jenius-help@btpn.com and we will be happy to help you further. Thank you. :)

content: Used to be revolutional banking system since they are one of the first to introduce digital banking in Indonesia; but right now I dont think the app works well anymore. It lag so much. It takes more than 20 seconds just to load the view receipt options for every tansaction I do. If this goes on, I might have to reconsider a better app for my day to day transaction.

Worst experience! Slow and unresponsive. Still trying to believe that Jenius will fix this lag issues ASAP, but everytime the app gets updated, it becomes more and more unresponsive. I am in the brink of leaving this bank and its apps

Application is so slow and there were occassions where they charged my balance TWICE for one purchase (it was resolved by calling the customer center when messaging them through the app appeared to be the most horrible experience I've had) and charged my balance even before I completed my order (meaning after I completed my order, I would pay twice for that order. I left my balance insufficient to complete that order, so Jenius returned my money somehow BUT then they charged 5k for that)
replyContent: Hi, we are sorry that you're having issues with the app. Can you write to us at jenius-help@btpn.com. Kindly include a description of the issue you are facing, your Android version, and your app version. We will investigate immediately & solve the issue.

content: Does NOT (appear) to work with a VPN. Therefore I won't use and won't recommend!!!

After I updated the app, I can't login with fingerprint. Also icoming transfer notification appeared but the money isn't there, the app still showing the total money before incoming transfer and I can't do anything for it. Repair it asap!!
replyContent: Hi Anggit, Sorry for the inconvenience. We appreciate your feedback that can help to improve Jenius in the future so we can provide better services.Thank you😊

content: It's a good app, revolutional. The downside is, I don't like how I have to call the call center just to unlock my device when I want to move the app to another phone. It's just so unnecessary, time consuming, annoying, and it consumes money (pulsa) to call the call center. Other banking app can do just fine without annoying step like this.

Long story short, at first, this app is very convenient. After a few tweaks and updates, it is so hard to see my saver balance without it have to be refreshed over and over again. The "failed to upload data" notification keeps coming and it really frustrates me when I need to do an immediate transfer or checking. Shouldn't have gone from hero to zero.
replyContent: Hi Ariadne, mohon maaf atas ketidaknyamanan yang kamu alami. Hal itu akan jadi perbaikan buat Jenius kedepannya biar bisa memberikan layanan yang lebih baik lagi.Terima kasih😊

content: It's getting slower and failed transactions occurred more often. More annoying push notifications. QR payments mostly failed (successful with other mbanking), it took so long to load the app and check the balance. Not only that, even normal bank transfers are getting buggy (failed transfer). Oh and the text in the inapp CS chat is white! I can't even see what i typed. FYI I'm using the latest app :)

It's been 4 months and currently have issue of everytime I open apps, it's always "Jenius sedang menyiapkan data" all the times and it take some time. Then there are so many bugs of notification that my transaction is failed but actually it's successful. Well it makes me a little bit upset. Please fix it, the saving rate is already decrease and I won't disappointed with the system too
replyContent: Hi, Gustav. Mohon maaf atas ketidaknyamanannya. Mohon kesediaannya kamu untuk mencoba pengecekan kembali secara berkala aplikasi Jenius kamu. Apakah saat ini kamu masih mengalami kendala yang sama?  🙂

content: Update: Unresponsive during pin input to access the app (spoiler: it cannot be accessed). Terrible experience during online payment. The money was transferred but the well known travel agent did not receive the payment. Sluggish performance and lower interest rate every now and then. It's okay to pay Feesible but please make the interest high as it used to be. Thankfully it still offers online debit for accessibility. Kudos to the customer service for fast response.

After updated, the connection become more slowly. I tried to open other apps like ig, tt, fb, etc, it's running smoothly and fastly. I think the problem is from Jenius apps, the connection is very slow, i can't open jenius dashboard, save it, etc, all of it, it's just loading loading error, and then try again, loading, error, and always like that, please fix it!!!!!!!!!!!

The service itself is good, it makes saving and managing your money easier. The problem is the app, it is so slow, so clunky, especially with the new update. I couldn't even log in. If you're in a rush, you'll lose your temper waiting for the app to work. Frankly we don't need an update of the UI, the old UI worked just fine. We need the app to work faster and more stable. Edit: there were 2 updates after I write this review, but still no improvement.
replyContent: Hi, Andina. Terima kasih atas feedback yang kamu berikan untuk Jenius, ya. 😊

content: The app is working so seriously slow, crashing a lot and currently the notification didn't pop out when there was a payment had been paid or anything. Also e-card now it didn't mention the money got debited for what, only Visa Merchant Payment, but yes, I know, to make sure if my card was secure I need to know what was that for. And for those reasons, lately I feel insecure to use the app. Please make it better and secure to use daily.

Very slow and very lagging compare to other apps. UI and UX sometime confusing and not clear what, why, when, and how. And it easily put me out of the app while I was looking for number or another bank account for seconds. It's an annoying app. Edited in response to BTPN : Yes, my internet is stable and very fast. I use fast internet (broadband) from Indihome. Many reviewers also said the same about the slowliness and lagging of Genius. Please improve that, BTPN.
replyContent: Hi, Tonny. Mohon kesediaan kamu untuk dapat memastikan koneksi internet dalam keadaan stabil, ya. Terima kasih. 😊

content: The app is quite slow, even slower than heavy games I've had on my phone. I've also been having this problem where I can't set up Fingerprint Login, and asking on Twitter didn't help much either :/ Online support will just asks you to contact them by phone later... Whenever I try to activate Fingerprint Login, after it asks my PIN, it's supposed to ask me to scan my finger. But in my case, after entering my PIN the app just errors out "Oops.. your fingerprint is not recognized." What a shame.
replyContent: Hi Dee, Sorry for the inconvenience. We appreciate your feedback that can help to improve Jenius in the future so we can provide better services. Please send a detailed description of the problem to jenius-help@btpn.com. We will definitely provide you with a solution soon. Thank you 😊

content: The chat keeps connecting for some reason and I can't even once talk with the operator. Trying to log out and guess what happened, it shows the PIN entry page (with the fingerprint) and once I entered the PIN it only took me back to my dashboard. Here's the thing, the concept and the whole service itself is good. But admit it your app doesn't.

The features are great, and older versions of the app used to run smoothly. However, these past few versions are so bad I can't even login, and when I do, the app is so slow I'm quite hesistant to do any transactions in case my funds get stuck on an error. From the social media comments I'm not alone on this, so please fix the app!
replyContent: Hi Monika, can you please update to our latest release. Please contact us via phone 1500365 or e-mail jenius-help@btpn.com if the issue persists. Thanks.😊

content: I'm about to register into Jenius when it asks for a photo of my KTP. When I took a picture of it, it's always blurry and tapping the screen doesn't allow me to refocus? So every photo of my KTP is very, very blurry. (My camera works in all other apps to refocus, but not in Jenius, I tried like 7 times but all is blurry). I honestly don't know what to do, so I uninstalled it.
replyContent: Hi Akari, mohon maaf untuk ketidaknyamanan yang kamu alami. Untuk bisa dibantu registrasi kamu, bisa coba datang ke booth Jenius yang ada di Jabodetabek, Bandung, Surabaya, Malang, Medan, atau Makassar, ya. Hal ini akan jadi masukan dan perbaikan buat Jenius kedepannya. Terima kasih. 🙂

content: Problems with logging in have been occurring for MONTHS now. Fingertip login got an update, but still causes problems. Pin login is buggy as well. This app is SLOW even for my phone with 8GB of RAM. App is heavy on resource-consumption, and clearly not well-optimised. I genuinely love the concept & features Jenius offer, but the app sucks and needed a major revamp & performance optimisation from the developer's end.

Face recognition is so bad, always no face detected in the end, waste of time. No issue with other bank's face recognition. What's worse, this is required to install the app to other device. Maybe I should just transfer out all my balance and forget about this app altogether

I transferred IDR 3 mil to my account. I can see the number updated. I went straight transfer 2 mil into 2 Flexi savings account. But now my active balance is going back to the original amount before the transfer. Please fix this problem.
replyContent: Hi, Kami mohon maaf atas ketidaknyamanan yang dialami. Informasi yang kamu utarakan saat ini dalam perhatian kami untuk dapat dijadikan masukan terhadap Jenius, sehingga kami dapat menyediakan layanan yang lebih baik lagi.^MBS

content: The loading's taking too much time. I lost my patience over and over again. Refresh, reloading and reopening it doesn't help at all.

It is really hard to call CS!! What is also annoying is that it could give you a notification from a cc transaction that i did 2 days ago! Imagine sitting down on you couch at 8am with the cc in your wallet and then you read a notification that says your cc has just been charge an xxx amount of rupiah etc etc. You would've thought someone hacks your cc! If this notif keeps happening, then i wouldnt notice if oneday someone really actually hacks your cc!

Jenius used to be genius, but everything changed when the fire nation attacked, and now the app is VERY slow. I can't log in, paid my bills, send money, even check my transactions before experiencing at least 20 minutes lag. I once missed a cute pair of pants in a first-pay-first-get thrift store because Jenius took forever to load, and by the time I managed to transfer the money, the pants were already sold. Where is the Jenius that I used to love?
Even verification always failed, and make me go to the booth but still verification at booth still takes time and still failed. What a mess

At first, everything is fine. But after the update to make more dream saver and flexi saver, my jenius cannot use the feature anymore. I can only use one flexi saver, everytime i want to make the new flexi saver, it's just not there. I already complain about the problem for my dream saver, but it still not resolved yet. Still showing "error from the internal server"
replyContent: Hi Clarissa,  Sorry for the inconvenience. We appreciate your feedback that can help to improve Jenius in the future so we can provide better services. Please send a detailed description of the problem to jenius-help@btpn.com. We will definitely provide you with a solution soon.Thank you and have a nice day! 😃

content: I read a lot of glowing reviews for Jenius (the service, not the app), so I thought I'd give it a try. When I got to the play store page, I saw a lot of 1*-2* reviews, but the overall rating is still 4.4* or something, thus I installed it and registered anyway. BIG MISTAKE. This is, by far, the clunkiest "digital" bank app I've ever used, even the new kids on the block (B** and L***) is much, much better. I had to do the video call activation thingy SIX TIMES because everytime it would either freeze or not showing anything (I used several different phone operators but the same thing happen). Past that fiasco, logging in takes 15-30 seconds to load the main page, and it takes another 5-10 seconds to do every. single. thing. If I change focus to another app I will be asked to login again (which will repeat the whole waiting game). I haven't really tried the service, but my overall assessment so far: MEDIOCRE. With the addition of the monthly fee, the new assessment is: BELOW AVERAGE. What "digital" bank charges a monthly fee anyway? What a sham!

I've came to love Jenius so much but lately I have to say that this app has been frustrating me so much!! Lags, disconnections, and such. Especially today, I got a new phone and tried to install the app onto the new phone, but every time I tried to log in it says that my session has expired and logged me out automatically each time!!! I've had no problems with my previous phone, so why did this happen? I'll improve the rating if the app is better!

Superb concept, poor execution: great many features, but very bad application. It is very very unresponsive, it takes time to load even the main menu, and more time to show data. Please optimize the app so that it can provide seamless experince just like any other banking application.

Good features, poor execution. App is laggy, occasionally crashes, and is sometimes unresponsive. I like the design and workflow, but the app need further optimization. Doing 5 or more transfer in a row is a hassle because we need to wait for it to restart after being unresponsive.
replyContent: Hi Davin, Sorry for the inconvenience. We appreciate your feedback that can help to improve Jenius in the future so we can provide better services. If you still have any questions about Jenius, don’t hesitate to contact Jenius Help via Twitter @jeniushelp, dialing 1500365 via phone, or e-mail to jenius-help@btpn.com. Thank you😊

content: I oftenly experienced difficulty when logging in, and the app tends to pop up an error message when I'm trying to make a transfer. Moreover, the app itself is quite slow comparing to other banks' apps. All in all, Jenius is not a reliable banking app, at least for now, and definitely made me think to switch into another bank.
replyContent: Hi, Kartika Dhipta. Sorry for the inconvenience. We appreciate your feedback that can help to improve Jenius in the future so we can provide better services. You can ask Jenius Help to solve your problem by dialing 1500365 via phone, or e-mail to jenius-help@btpn.com. Thank you😊

content: I was a satisfied customer of Jenius. Almost nothing ever went wrong so was pretty confused about the complaints from other people. Just yesterday however I lost my phone and had to download+log in from the new device. It kept on saying session has expired and log me out automatically. Can't log in until now. Now i see what the fuss is all about. Please help fix. Thank you.

Overall experience is decent, but the customer service chat need improvements. It looks like the customer service people can't get the context since every chat session is a new session and therefore chat messages are lost, so even every bit of interruptions (internet disconnect, timeout, etc) means a new chat session and all the context are lost, even when the customer's problem haven't been solved. Please update the application so that each chat session can be saved and read by the custops
replyContent: Hi Aditya, mohon maaf untuk ketidaknyamanannya. Hal itu bakal jadi masukan dan perbaikan buat Jenius kedepannya, ya. Terima kasih 🙂

content: It became slower slower and slower . This apps was good at first. But its really frustrating right now. I cant even load my balance and save it feature. And it makes me doubt the functionality or even the safety of this apps. And starting considering another alternatives.

I really liked this app. I have been using it for my electronic payments to buy ebooks in Google Play Book. But there are some things I dislike. Firstly, there's no other way to access it on new smartphone unless I contact the call center to get the app unlinked on my old phone. It is both time and cost consuming because I have to have "pulsa" while you know nowadays people rely mostly on internet-based calls and messages. Your app is based on internet so why don't make it simpler? Secondly, the respond in help center through chat is too slow responding. I bought an ebook and my card was declined in the e-commerce but the balance in my account was cut two times. I understand that there will be some troubles like this but please do respond quickly. I had to explain my trouble two times to two different people because of the slow responding. Please do improve this.

Slowest app i have ever experienced. The practicality is great, flexi saver, maxi saver. Also the ability get report of money spend in different categories is also great. But the apps just too slow! Please optimise your apps codes to be more efficient. All of the great things this app has is degraded by the slow loading of this apps.

This app is really useful when I need to prepare for my study abroad with no credit card. It also helps me to pay my Netflix subscription. But when it comes to helping daily transactions, it really fruatrates me. Better erase the CS 'chat' features on the app. It really is no use!!

Nice app but the bank itself solves your case slower than a snail. I've rang the CS for several times since November 2019 and they always told me that they needed some extra time working on the case. It's not a big amount of money, but it sure makes the bank losing its customer's trust. The chat feature is also terrible. No CS responded to the chat and the annoying "are you still there" keeps popping up while it's me the one who's waiting for the CS to respond.
replyContent: Hi Jessica, mohon maaf untuk ketidaknyamanannya. Hal itu akan jadi masukan dan perbaikan buat Jenius kedepannya, ya. Kamu bisa hubungi Jenius Help 1500 365 atau kunjungi Jenius Live untuk dibantu. Terima kasih 🙂

content: What happened to the update? The apps worked flawlessly before. But now I've tried 8 times to log in & always failed (after being asked to change my PIN coz biometric didn't work). I can't log in because the apps always considered I type the wrong PIN during second verification. After 8 attempts I uninstall the apps. Strangely, after I reinstall I can change my PIN and do 1 transaction. But error happened again & I got to repeat the process again. Right now I give up until the apps being fixed

The app (including the lastest update) becomes painfully slow. It takes ages only to open the app. It takes another ages to log in. Every single tap and step takes very long time. 30 minutes is wasted away only to transfer money. You now take montlhy fee, you should be better than this, don't you think? Or do you think that it's time to earn back your burning money?
replyContent: Hi! Mohon untuk kamu coba lakukan update aplikasi Jenius ke versi 2.8.1, ya. Kalau masih ada menu yang terpotong di aplikasi Jenius-mu, bisa langsung infokan melalui message media sosial Jenius Connect 😊

content: The customer service experience is pretty horrible, not the agents but it's the 15 seconds window instead. When you ask something to the agent they tend to ask you to wait, while you wait there's going to be this 15 seconds countdown, you need to confirm you're still there. Otherwise the chat ends on its own, really dumb system, this causes me to keep texting me the cs again because the chat keeps getting ended.
replyContent: Hi. Apabila kamu mengalami kendala aplikasi Jenius, kamu bisa hubungi Jenius Help melalui telepon di 1500365, chat di aplikasi Jenius, chat di aplikasi Jenius, e-mail ke jenius-help@btpn.com, datang ke booth Jenius atau cabang BTPN terdekat untuk dibantu pengecekan. Terima kasih. 😊

content: Jenius was my favorite banking apps previously, and I have put most of my money. However Jenius disappoint me a lot these days - can't login d/t changing phone, history not shown (always in maintenance mode and they only can resolve it at 8am WIB), and new UI makes it a lot longer to load. The unreliability system makes me feeling anxious & insecure; thinking to move money to other Bank for more security.

You guys have just successfully turned one of the top-notch, premium-class, user-friendly, BEST banking app in Indonesia (maybe ASEAN), into a big bulk of nothing. It WAS perfect. It WAS fast. It WAS reliable. Thanks to those disturbing updates, now it becomes a RAM-consuming, jammed flop. Bye, J. So sad. Time to find another bank.

Everything's working just fine, the app is quite complete but has friendly UI. Except when I needed it the most, i had these experiences when i already transferred to money, but transactions have not been complete till the next next day. It happened when i tried to buy phone credits and other urgent things. Sad, i'll give 5 star when this issue is solved.
replyContent: Hi Danar,  Sorry for the inconvenience. We appreciate your feedback that can help to improve Jenius in the future so we can provide better services. Thank you 😊

content: it was really good, a digital banking app that was easy to use and reliable. but now you are adding this "feesible" thing, which is just monthly banking fees that CONFLICT with your promises in the past about not having any monthly fees. its not about the Rp10.000 its about not fulfillig your promises in the past.

Just changed my phone. Need to log in on my new phone (obviously) but i can't. The app says the session is expired but how can it be expired if i haven't even actually log in? The email notif said to log out of the old device but i already reset it and to call the call center. Tried calling but was kept on hold. Tried emailed but there's no response. DM-ed their ig but told to cal the call center (which doesn't work like i said previously). Please fix this soon. I need my account.

Fix the new device registration system or you'll keep bleeding users. Why should we call the call center just to register a new device. Give us browser page where we can manage our devices on our own or something the like. If you want extra security, make it so that a certain device registered can be flagged as master device that cant be logged out or fiddled with through the browser page. Not this pain in the butt system. Until this issue is fixed, the star will stay at 2
replyContent: Hi. Terima kasih atas feedback yang kamu berikan untuk Jenius ya. :)

content: Good feature, but the apps is sooo slow. I waited for OTP and its not appeared on my inbox. Upgrade your server or something, i dunno what make it so sluggish. I need to do transaction but got hold because of the slow response.

It used to be so good, smooth. But now I can't even transfer to an account which I just accessed from another bank app. It says 'the savings account is no longer valid", but I can open the account I want to send to easily. Huft
replyContent: Halo Nimas. Apakah kamu saat ini masih mengalami kendala yang sama? Jika ya, kamu bisa coba update aplikasi Jenius ke versi terbaru dan coba untuk transaksi lagi. 😊

content: everything was fine, but just right now I'm about to transfer something important and i can't get through the front page of the app, nothing show up when i input my password manually or using fingerprints it just stay at the front page. i've tried to restart my phone nd update the app but nothing change ! please help !
replyContent: Halo Gabriella, jika kamu mengalami kendala Jenius kamu bisa tanyakan ke Twitter @JeniusHelp atau hubungi Jenius Help melalui telepon 1500365, ya. 😉

content: I really like how Jenius works and it's compatible with most of my overseas purchases HOWEVER!!! PLEASE GET THE APP FIXED!!! I have been using Jenius for over a year; you've had Moneytory, slight new updates here and there but were there any improvements for user experience at all? Every time I login I always have to brace myself for errors, top-ups, money sending often fails during business hours etc. I'd like to keep using Jenius so PLEASE PLEASE DO SOMETHING ABOUT THE UX, THANK YOU.

I tried to pay for my Google subscription using a genius e-card but the app is slow and because I tried again and again, I was charged for insufficient funds 9 times. So I lost IDR 45,000 and didn't get any explanation for the cost. It was a bad experience.
replyContent: Hi, mohon maaf atas ketidaknyamanan yang kamu alami. Hal itu akan jadi perbaikan buat Jenius kedepannya biar bisa memberikan layanan yang lebih baik lagi. Terima kasih 😊

content: I never used this app for any other payment except for Netflix and for savings. It keeps charge me a huge amount of monthly fees and taxes. I used Jenius to keep my savings, but now it charge me so big that i'm afraid to top up. For a student like me it is very inconvenient.

The loading takes too long as if it's a heavy app, it's inconvenient. My internet connection is good but the dashboard makes me reload the page all over again. Sometimes the app stops working and closes by itself. You should take BNI Mobile Banking app as an example.
replyContent: Hi Eka, mohon maaf untuk ketidaknyamanannya. Hal itu akan jadi masukan dan perbaikan buat Jenius kedepannya, ya. Kamu bisa hubungi Jenius Help 1500 365 atau kunjungi Jenius Live untuk dibantu. Terima kasih 🙂

content: Sluggish UI and poor app loading speed regardless of internet speed. Quite onnoying Login issue & can't do a transaction sometimes. These issues don't always happen all the time, but it's a mess when it comes to a time where we are having urgent transaction.

The new interface is better for me, more simple. But the loading speed is getting slower. It's take almost more than 10s just for the opening page. While other mbanking are getting faster with nice and clean UI.

Please, you can't have all online access without a good app. I've tried so many times to open the apps, it says that my pin is wrong until I need to put a new pin, but after that it's still remain the same, they keep saying that my pin is wrong and then I need to input my password and input authentication number all over again. Fix this please, thank you.
replyContent: Hi Adinda, Sorry for the inconvenience. We appreciate your feedback that can help to improve Jenius in the future so we can provide better services.  Thank you 😊

content: Okay I have a fingerprint trouble with my old phone. It didn't work. So after I buy the new one, I still get the same trouble. Come on.. if the feature is not supporting all devices, especially updated ones, better fix it or remove it. Make me insecure.
replyContent: Hi, we are sorry that you're having issues with the app. Can you write to us at jenius-help@btpn.com. Kindly include a description of the issue you are facing, your Android version, and your app version. We will investigate immediately & solve the issue. 😊

content: I just started to log in to my account. But it failed, I've tried it many times and still failed. Disclaimer : I using the correct email and password and started to create my new pin. But my session had expired and log out automatically

One thing that needs to be improved from this application is that the session ends quickly; for example when you're in the transaction process, then you switch the application to the background, when you return, you're asked to enter the password again and your transaction process is lost alias you've to start from the beginning. The worst thing is when you need Jenius Help, you can't take your eyes off this application because otherwise your chat with CS will be ended suddenly.

The app frequently lags and now I have difficulty log in, first they ask the finger print, which failed with unknown reason, then pin, which failed again with unknown reason also. It happen quite often but this time took more than 24 hours, and it hasnt been resolved or repaired. :(

I used to love jenius, is so usefull and handy for saving and transactions, but now the apps often lags and takes a long time to even open.. And about the penalty fee of insufficient balance? Really.. And the monthly fees? Eventhough i cant see any improvement on the service or the app itself is very disappointing 😞

Actually I really really love this app on the functionality side. I mean, its the first that have cool features that I, as user, really need in a banking app. But then these days, you frequently maintain the app at the time when people still use it, day time, evening time and it makes us the users cant login or make a transaction. It's annoying. I mean, you know banking is really important, and let the user cant access they money? Come on. Pick night time or after midnight to maintain your app!!

I tried opening the app this morning. I've tried both fingerprint login and pin code login, but I can't get in. The loading takes very long, and I can't still get in. Please fix this. Edit: I tried logging in with fingerprint, and it still didn't work. It said something about the connection
replyContent: Hi Heydi, Sorry for the inconvenience. We appreciate your feedback that can help to improve Jenius in the future so we can provide better services. Please do try to login again, is it currently still facing the same problem? 😃

content: Previous UI is better. Now it's too 'clean' and confusing. Fingerprint login can't be used. Logged out too soon; less than 2 minutes when checking on other apps. I'm really close to switch to other online bank.

Good app but long loading time. E.g open screen, switch to see wealth, move balances, make transfers. Compared to other mbanking app, this one takes time in switching pages. Perhaps consider not tp load every info all at once and use simpler icons. Also many bugs (e.g unable to download transfer receipt from in/out)

Dissapointed. Have used this app for long time enough. But recently I changed my phone and cannot log in at all. It says that my session has been expired and logged out. I have tried to log in again but cannot and same message appeared.

Honestly, I don't mind the monthly fee at all, as long as there's a significant improvement with the app. But so far all I got is headache from this app because of how slow it is, and the app won't even let me log in w/ my fingerprint, and that is on a good day. On a bad day I can't even log in with my PIN, it's ridiculous.
replyContent: Hi, we are sorry that you're having issues with the app. Can you write to us at jenius-help@btpn.com. Kindly include a description of the issue you are facing, your Android version, and your app version. We will investigate immediately & solve the issue.

content: For God sake Jenius! Fix your server or whatsoever it is, just fix your app!! It takes about HALF AN HOUR just to withdraw my money from saving to main balance and top up my e-wallet. Now, with the monthly fee and those experiences, you just gone worse. Shame on you!

Best innovation from Indonesia since Indomie goreng. Jenius makes my life much easier. Hassle free banking. They're developing the feature since forever.

internal camera from this application is not working properly. Surrounding lighting was good and bright enough. Taking ID picture always comes out blurred. tried the standard camera on my phone, the camera is working alright so i guess it's the app not my camera.

i can't even activate my account, when using video call activation after connected the apps suddenly close and restarted. i've been try 3times and its still not work. my internet connection are reliable and stable , there's no problem on my side. is there any work out on this?

E-wallet center is very buggy, often failed to add or top up an e-wallet. The error sign doesn't tell much about the problem though: "Oops, something went wrong, please try again later", very helpful for us users eh Jenius?

content: Feesible didn't bring anything new. The promos are dwindling, no more Monyay transfer fee cashback. It's not even registered with BI-fast! The flexi cash is weird because even when 1 million is saved for the whole month, the average balance came up short. With more digital banks coming up recently, people are going to leave Jenius if it can't compete with the services they offer, mostly for free.

Signed up and used Jenius on two phones. We were told we could do this no problem. Went with no issue for a few years, but now app access is completely stopped. We cannot access our investments, got told to go to different branch office only to be told it was a fraud that we used two devices to access the same account and they need 20 days to restore access. We are closing our account as soon as possible. We cannot access our investment accounts during this time. Support is not good enough.

I've been using Jenius for 2 years, I think Jenius doesn't really consider the things that customers put value for. Their new features are good, but not essential. The app is so sluggish, whenever I open the app, need about 1-2 minutes before I can access anything. Then, now I need to pay the "feesible" for features that don't add much value for my experience. In addition, the helpdesk didn't respond to my email at all. It's unfortunate but I have no reason to continue to use Jenius any longer.

In terms of banking & business value, I should conclude that Jenius is good. But for apps sake, please do improve: 1) fingerprint login is a mess, I use this type of login for many other apps and work properly, but not with Jenius 2) please make your apps lighter. It keeps on loading and very time consuming. It is such a disgrace for a frontier Digital Bank in Indonesia. You have been in the market since 2016, the apps should've been upgraded due to many feedbacks. 3) CS Chat no response.
replyContent: Hi Avraham, Sorry for the inconvenience. We appreciate your feedback that can help to improve Jenius in the future so we can provide better services. sorry for the inconvenience. Please send a detailed description of the problem to jenius-help@btpn.com. We will definitely provide you with a solution soon. Thank you 😊

content: OMG, Jenius. I just updated this app and I miss the old version of you which don't take much time for loading. Please fix this, thank you. And also, I used this app to using Flexi saver feature and since we have to paid 10rb for admin fees, I think it's too expensive like everyone said. I hope Jenius management could make better regulation in the future. Thanks.

I got an "oops, wrong PIN" everytime i tried to login. And i have no idea why my account can't be activated. The only clue i got is just an email saying that there are some requirements that i missed. But it's only that. What did i do wrong? What requirements do i miss? No idea Not a pleasant experience | edit/update: just don't register online, see an outlet and let the admin do it for you

For digital banking jenius was pioneer in Indonesia, you guys disrupt it good, but sadly the features and convenience can't keep up. The app new-UI feels like smoke-and-mirror to hide lot of old broken functionalities that never improved (no verbose trx status and lot of small things). Jenius has lost it's competitive advantages by stop growing up and especially with recent block to major payment provider (PayPal, Google etc) makes using the app no longer worth it.
replyContent: Hi, Erwin. Thank you for using Jenius! We apologize for the inconvenience and definitely, we listen to you. Once again thank you for the valuable feedback to us.

content: I forgot my password just a while a go, and its annoying and unnecessary the steps were, already the call center 3x with no help at all, wasting my mobile.data, and then chat help center, already provided my full data, which they verify that takes a lot of time as well, and then they tell me they will send an email 2 days later with link that is only active for 30 minutes since it was sent. still not reliable to be used as main account since the system is super slow and often erroneous - especially during paydays. for many times, they cant find the beneficiaries' bank accounts for transfer transactions. they also cant accommodate payment of CCs issued by most of Himbara banks and BCA. i actually love your app for the unpopular genius features but you definitely need to work much harder on your app dev, Jenius!

content: Dear Jenius, I hope you are doing well. Everyone seems to be putting angry reviews since your new policy last month for mandatory device unlink each time user reset their phone/got new phone. I've updated the app to the newest version and as I have changed to a new phone, and the app always said "session terminated" turns out that you have new policy for device unlinking WHICH I NEVER HEARD until that unsuccessful login and password reset attempted which also failed to login because it expects to see the registered device.Why not build a challenge-response and 2FA method is beyond me. Your competitor seems to have better implementation of this but still not recommended yet due to low exposure and still in its infancy.. Many untrusted sources said your 2secure page is ongoing maintenance but they said the truth is "it is closed permanently" I like many features of Jenius but if it is going to continue like this, it will not end in a good way. Your PR team maybe doing very good but it is very disappointing to see Customer Services that being unhelpful and slow at times, not to mention AppDev that maybe disappointed to see the app not accepted gracefully by the user. It is also disappointing to see that Jenius is related to SMBC which has good reputation in Japanese Customers. If any of your staff seen this review please kindly see to my ticket ID, I submitted through Sinaya BTPN for unlinking my old device : CAS-21-DN5856 Update: After one more time contacting your Call Center, it came to light that unlinking previous device includes possibilities of other devices linked. It should have been educated to all call center staffs that were on the frontline and receiving inquiries so as to not wasting customer time on the phone waiting system. A user may have possibilities to restart their phone and / or reinstalled Jenius on their phones after a Os reinstall many times. Thank God (and lucky me) all devices were now unlinked. I'll continue to use the app and update the review accordingly.

Can anybody from the team help me, please? I have tried activating the account using the video call feature but I kept receiving emails telling me that I needed to retry the whole process (which I did, twice, within a week) because Jenius requires further data notification. I called Jenius Help to assist me, but they only told me to make ANOTHER video call. Seriously, how many more video calls should be made before I can get my account activated?
replyContent: Hi,  Sorry for the inconvenience. We appreciate your feedback that can help to improve Jenius in the future so we can provide better services. Please send a detailed description of the problem to jenius-help@btpn.com. We will definitely provide you with a solution soon. Thank you 😊

content: used to like this app before. but since I logged out from this app, I cant login anymore. 'your session had expired' and just force closed. gosh, it irritates me so much. I've been doing the same step so many times

I updated the apps to the latest version but despite didn't let me log in, the message "your session has expired" continue appear Everytime I submit my email and password. what happened to this apps? I miss the old version
The app itself good. But, there are several features that make the app crashing like filtering for e-card invoice. Please fix this.

From me, i would say, from the time i put my prepaid into account up to nothing prepaid amounts left in account, all credit access remains disable to continue to next page, so it is like so many gates after the first and second gates; then scan qris button surprisingly autoaccessible/auto-operated by them not by my hand. And unsatisfied comments from all users below can not be just revealed by saying apologies nothing proven taking action in improvement by your appl designer/engineers.

content: Pretty decent apps regarding the UI, very bad performance for banking apps, takes longer on loading even using wifi network.

Most painful Reset Password procedure. To do transaction you need password, if you forget your password you need to reset password, to reset password you need m-card ccv, to check your ccv, you need password, to request physical m-card, you need password. When you request reset password manually, they will send the authentication to your email without clear timeline, and only 30 minutes validity (high chance you miss that 30 minutes window if you don't check your phone every 30 minute)
the ui are sooo slow. it takes a long time to load even on stable internet connection. make it very inconvenience to use, especially when you're in a hurry.

Edited from ★5 to ★2. Technical-wise, their app starts to break. One of the most annoying problem is your x/e-card balance does not update after a transaction happened, even though it appeared on the history. Service-wise, 10k every month? Hiding your administration fee as so-called "subscription fee"? Where did you threw the transparency honesty? Monyay getting more expensive, and they rob you for not having enough money on your card too to add the insult to the pain. Investor gone lol

content: I used to love your app and been using it for years. I think you used to have the best saving programs and it was so easy to navigate within your app as well. However since the last UI update, your app has been considerably slowing down, the UI is kinda confusing to navigate too. I think your old UI is way better, if you could change back, it would be awesome

Such a frustrating service. It says "Your session has expired" everytime I tried to login, whatever that means. Tried to login to the website and it's been on "maintenance" for forever without any ETA. The app itself is frustratingly slow and bloated to use. A big service such as this shouldn't have this many problems. Edit: The UI better and faster now. One thing I dislike is the 1 device limit. I'm actually ok with it, if they make it easier to unlink besides calling call center.

I thought by updating the app to the newest version, I can use the finger print log in easier. But no! It's still not working. This version loads more data than the previous one. It make the app's loading longer, more than 5 seconds, and make me as user uncomfortable. I don't like the new design. It's dominated by white colour while Jenius logo is dominated by blue. I slightly see blue color in this app. I hope you can be better so I won't move to other digital bank. Thx

Good system, good offer. UNFORTUNATELY, the app is very slow most of the time. Too many loadings. After inputting PIN, need to wait 10 seconds. Then need to wait another 10 seconds for the dashboard to load. Then need to wait another longer for other operations. I suggest instead of spending the money on numerous booths, billboards, etc.,invest in creating a smooth app first. Hope to see improvement in the next update. It's a shame such a good app is destroyed by a laggy, slow navigation.

Been used around 6 months. When I just joined, around 2-3 days after, at night, I got an error, says something about login session expired. The issue persist until tomorrown morning. I called CS and they say no issue with systems etc, exactly on the same time, when I do check to login, and it still error. Apart of that, all seems good and lately their system didn't have any error / slow loading. But, unfortunately, I decide to close my account, since I'm afraid same thing happened again. :(

The app is actually pretty good, easy to use and has good features. However, it took a long time to load every time I switch to another page, even with fast internet connection. This is very inconvenient, especially when you need to make transactions or even just to look at transactions quickly. Better start to fix the problem instead of telling the user to have a better connection because I know I'm not the only one with this experience.

apps looks nice, but bloated and very slow to use. things to add: jenius use 800MB of RAM on my phone, compared to (indo's biggest private bank)'s app that uses only 300MB, which makes jenius not old-phone friendly. also, please add option to remove wiring recepient, sometimes it's a one time transfer and having the account saved in the list may become a waste of resourceful system memories.

Top up e wallet is more often than not, a hit and miss. And the app will still record outgoing transaction in the In and Out eventhough the transaction was not succesful, which is confusing for record keeping. Also, loading time for getting in the app and some features takes ages, and sometimes it leads to crashes. Does the app becomes bad after BTPN acquired by SMBC?

Dear Jenius im using your apps and I still thought that you have been done a great job with this innovation. However please try to improve the performance in the loading page or even login. This is unbearable. It is very inconvenience to use your app with so much time waste to see the circle looping to load the menu. I've been updating your apps to see your improvement but it seems not much i could expect.

content: Everything is fine, but the session management is really bad. Sometimes I opened my app, and browse through the menus for about a minute and then suddenly I have to insert my PIN again. Please extend it a little bit, sometime users wants to check the card information back and forth before confirming any payments to avoid mistakes.

And when i finally got into the app after multiple tries, it still needed to load again when i just simply wanted to top-up e-wallets. Pls fix this or u can just make mobile-friendly web version one as an alternative. I really like Jenius but its so inconvenient to use at the moment :(

It took some time to open every feature in it AND always ask to close the feature bcs we didn't do much things in it (walau mungkin hanya sepersekian detik tidak melakukan apa-apa, but it is very annoying when the apps ask you that thing over and over again). content: GUI speaking this is genius apps. content: Takes forever to load the data. It's so effective to keep our money from being wasted too much, though. I will be less likely to withdraw my money let alone send or transfer it once it's been stored in the Flexy Saver because the app is very slow and sluggish during the transactions.

Hi Jenius, please improve your app. it gets me irrated that I have to reloads lots of time. your function is brilliant but the app is super slow. don't think that it's about my connection, everytime I have to wait for lots of loading, I gave up and move to another mbanking I had on my phone and viola...things get done quick. content: SUPER SLOW, most of us don't have that much free time in our hands, when we need to do something quick, we need it finished ASAP. We don't need too much new features, you guys better just improve what you already have first rather than keep making new features.

Jenius used to be my main bank due to the convenience and many cards that I can have for different purposes, but I've moved to another app/bank because I can't transfer or make payments when I really need to. content: I've been using Jenius since 2016/2017, and it was a cool experience but now I'm thinking on changing to other bank because of several annoying things: 1. content: For anyone that still stuck on 3.52, rollback to 3.51 then launch the app without mobile data/wifi off wait until the sign in/ pin shown to bypass the forced update page

The ui is great, easy to use, and there's a lot of feature. But the ux is so bad. Opening new page is slow, the ui motion is laggy. I just hope the ux and ui could be more consistent and smooth while providing best feature for your users. I would try again to use your service after those problems get fixed. In the end, to reach our destination, we just need a simple and fast route right?

The entire virtual banking concept merit the "genius" name. However, app stability is crucial! When it works? Great! But that is far from many. This is a banking app! Reliabililty and stability is key. There is too many issues on the server side and the client side.

The app keeps saying "Your session has expired" And automatically logged out. I tried several times, email the CS, but the problem still unsolved. Please fix this.

I've been using Jenius for over a year. Preface and features are great! But, when it comes to flexicash there are things to improve. First, I usually save all money on flexi saver to minimize spending. But flexicash only take money from primary balance. So, eventhough I have a lot of money inside flexi saver, if I don't put enough money on primary balance the flexicash says "You don't have enough balance" then I have to pay 50.000 more for being 1 day late. It's REAAALLY annoying! Such a bummer
replyContent: Halo Ayunda, mohon maaf atas ketidaknyamanan yang kamu alami. Kami akan infokan kepada tim terkait untuk kemajuan Jenius kedepannya. Have a nice day! 😃

Force closes indicates improper error handling. Take care that RuntimeException or similar thing on react. Write unit test for it

Got rejected by verificator because I don't have a physical KTP-el and can't provide 'resi' from Kelurahan. My NIK is already in the KTP-el database, thus it could be verified through their online verification process.
replyContent:
Hi, Lugas. We apologize for the inconvenience, you can create the Jenius account by using a refference letter from Kelurahan. 

A valid reference letter should contains the following information:
a. Photo
b. Population Registration Number (NIK)
c. Validity period of the letter
d. Signature and stamp of the local district

Thank you, Lugas. 😉

I have a good experience with the app. This apps is useful and the interface is great. But sadly though the network is just too unreliable.Hopefully jenius will be much more reliable when they start charging their customer. If not, then I'll look for their competitors.

Overall, this is everything I could expect from a digital banking app. There are so many useful features for managing my finances. My suggestion is to make the Dark Mode option on the next update.

Please make this app more securely (no screenshot for card number, etc) and keep up your good work in future. All the best for ya!

content: Do you know why you have to pay monthly "administration" fees to banks for essentially nothing? Because they are old, inefficient banks that maintains huge network of branches you rarely visit (if ever) anyway. Enter digital banking. With Jenius, you don't have to pay for nothing: zero minimum balance, zero transaction fees (up to certain limits), zero cash withdrawal fees, it's basically free money! To put cherry on top of the cake, the interest rate is also almost amongst the best in the country. I can definitely say that Jenius is the best digital banking here in Indonesia. I have other digital banking accounts at several other banks and, hands down, Jenius' app and overall user experience (including customer service) is the most stellar and consistent of them all. Go ahead and try explore Jenius! Promise you won't regret it.
replyContent: Thank you for choosing Jenius App for your financial transaction. Jenius, isn't it?

content: Bagus semua kecuali 1 yg merepotkan. Tarikan tunai di atm dibatasi 1,25jt per tarik. Kalau mau tarik 10jt sehari pecahan 100rb harus di pecah 8x @1,2jt + 1x @400rb (total 9x tarik).
